scripts.on-release: lerna bootstrap && lerna link && git add . && git commit -m "prepublish" && git push
scripts.release:patch: yarn on-release && lerna exec "yarn publish --access public --patch"
scripts.release:minor: yarn on-release && lerna exec "yarn publish --access public --minor"
scripts.release:major: yarn on-release && lerna exec "yarn publish --access public --major"
